1108514848793681922.text:
Per @VitalikButerin’s suggestion, we discussed Hurricane Guard as a proactive solution to deliver emergency aid. They make payments in real-time when hurricane speeds are detected within 30 miles of your home. Being built on @etherisc.

https://hurricaneguard.io/
